main event: A UFO was observed moving slowly across the sky in Painesville, Ohio on 6 Aug 1959.
interesting points: The object moved from west to east for about 1-2 minutes,It appeared to oscillate from side to side,It was larger than a star and shone with a white light,It did not leave any vapor trail,The motion did not appear to be that of an aircraft.
sighted object: one oscillating light in the sky
